candidates.title: Updating documentation and smoltcp version
candidates.body:
This PR updates the `smoltcp-nal` to utilize the smoltcp 0.8 release.

This PR also beefs up some of the documentation.

candidates.title: Shared: Add Network Stack Sharing Utilities
candidates.body:
Shamelessly taken from your `stabilizer` firmware ;).

Motivation:
Since I couldn't find a way to trigger the poll function for `smoltcp`, when I use the `minimq` crate (no_std) without this or a similar implementation. And it took me quite some time to figure this out, I think it would be the best to add it as a feature.

candidates.title: Feature/embedded time support
candidates.body:
This PR fixes #28 by refactoring the time storage mechanism to account for time wrapping internally.

This PR fixes #2 by using an `embedded_time::Clock` internally for polling smoltcp.

candidates.title: Super simple rand support for the new smoltcp requirement
Feature/udp support
candidates.body:
This PR fixes #16 by adding UDP socket support.

TODO:
- [x] Integrate https://github.com/smoltcp-rs/smoltcp/pull/482 to incorporate UDP close/unbind
- [x] Merge #7 to support newest smoltcp
- [x] Wait for https://github.com/smoltcp-rs/smoltcp/pull/494 and use `master` branch

candidates.title: Updating to v0.6 of the embedded-nal
candidates.body:
This PR resolves #11 by updating to embedded-nal v0.6 (the current release).

This PR also:
* Updates the repository to utilize const-generics
* Removes all usage of `RefCell`

**Testing**

This branch (along with the minimq update to the embedded-nal) were run on Stabilizer. It was confirmed that Stabilizer acquired an IP via DHCP and published MQTT telemetry as expected.

candidates.title: Refactoring for socket-based DHCP
candidates.body:
This PR updates the NAL to utilize the updated DHCP client implemented in https://github.com/smoltcp-rs/smoltcp/pull/459

TODO:
- [x] Wait for the DHCP client merge to complete and update dependency

candidates.title: Fixing heapless dependency
candidates.body: Updating heapless to explicitly use 0.6.1 - code will not work with 0.7, as there are breaking changes.

candidates.title: Feature/dhcp support
candidates.body:
This PR adds support for a DHCP client and fixes #6. When a DHCP client is used, the NAL will automatically manage IP address leases provided via the DHCP server.

This has been tested with stabilizer code and wireshark analysis indicates that IP addresses are being properly assigned.

candidates.title: Adding support for TCP port randomization
candidates.body:
This PR fixes #4 by using the WyRand algorithm to randomize local TCP support selection.

**TODO**:
- [x] Test randomization on hardware

candidates.title: Updating heapless, adding audit CI check
candidates.body: Updates the heapless dependency to remove audit concerns

chosen_pr.title: Fixing heapless dependency
chosen_pr.body: Updating heapless to explicitly use 0.6.1 - code will not work with 0.7, as there are breaking changes.
